name: Cuban-style Suckling Pig (Lechon Asado)
keywords: black beans, rice, suckling pig, main course, winter
recipeIngredient: Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Saute the onion in the butter until soft. Add the diced liver, kidneys and heart and saute for two to three minutes. Add the rice, beans, guava paste and parsley. Season with salt and pepper. Mix thoroughly and correct seasoning.

Stuff the pig loosely with the mixture and sew the cavity or secure with skewers. Place the pig on a roasting rack and rub with olive oil. Roast for 3 1/2 to 4 hours, or until an internal temperature of 155 to 160 degrees is reached.
